onyomiExamples.meaning: single, simple, singles (tennis, badminton, etc.), win bet, bet which predicts the winner of a race
unit, denomination, credit (in school), in units of (e.g. "in thousands"), in amounts of

kunyomiExamples.meaning: one layer, single layer, monopetalous, unlined kimono, single-edged eyelid, eyelid with an epicanthic fold, upper eyelid with no fold
unlined kimono, one kimono, a single kimono
twelve-layered ceremonial kimono (worn by a court lady), ajuga (Ajuga nipponensis), bugle
